introduction: Being a human in the 21st century often feels frustrating. We are clearly at the high point of our s

vocabulary.example: The pervasive smell of fresh flowers filled the room.
She reached the apex of her career when she became the CEO.
It seems daft to go out without an umbrella in this rain.
The complexity of the theory was beyond fathomable for most students.

vocabulary.definition: a natural or inherent impulse or behavior
vocabulary.example: Her instinct told her to run when she heard the loud noise.

vocabulary.definition: a state of equilibrium or equipoise
vocabulary.example: In order to live a healthy life, it's important to maintain a balance between work and leisure.
